entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
